titles.title: We've Got So Much, So Much

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We've got so much, so much,
so much, so much, so much, so much, so much, so much,
so much, so much, so much to be thankful for. (Repeat 3x.)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: We've got each other to be thankful for. (Repeat 3x.)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: We've got Jesus to be thankful for. (Repeat 3x.)
